properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Claroty'
| extend EventVendor = 'Claroty'
| extend EventProduct = 'Claroty'
| extend EventSchemaVersion = 0.2
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend packed = pack(DeviceCustomNumber1Label, DeviceCustomNumber1
                     , DeviceCustomNumber2Label, DeviceCustomNumber2
                     , DeviceCustomNumber3Label, DeviceCustomNumber3
                     , DeviceCustomString1Label, DeviceCustomString1
                     , DeviceCustomString2Label, DeviceCustomString2
                     , DeviceCustomString3Label, DeviceCustomString3
                     , DeviceCustomString4Label, DeviceCustomString4
                     , DeviceCustomString5Label, DeviceCustomString5
                     , DeviceCustomString6Label, DeviceCustomString6
                     , DeviceCustomDate1Label, DeviceCustomDate1
                     , DeviceCustomDate2Label, DeviceCustomDate2)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed)
| mv-apply AdditionalFields = extract_all(@'(?P<key>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)=(?P<value>[a-zA-Z0-9-_:/@.,#{}><" ]+)', dynamic(["key","value"]), AdditionalExtensions) on (
    project packed1 = pack(tostring(AdditionalFields[0]), tostring(AdditionalFields[1]))
    | summarize bag = make_bag(packed1)
)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| extend packed2 = pack(cs7Label, cs7
                     , cs8Label, cs8
                     , cs9Label, cs9
                     , cs10Label, cs10)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed2)
| extend EventEndTime = todatetime(ReceiptTime)
| project-rename EventProductVersion=DeviceVersion
                , EventSubType=cat
                , EventOriginalType=DeviceEventClassID
                , EventSeverity=LogSeverity
                , EventMessage=Message
                , DstPortNumber=DestinationPort
                , DstIpAddr=DestinationIP
                , DstDvcHostname=DestinationHostName
                , DstUserName=DestinationUserName
                , DvcIpAddr=DeviceAddress
                , DvcHostname=DeviceName
                , DstMacAddr=DestinationMACAddress
                , NetworkApplicationProtocol=Protocol
                , SrcPortNumber=SourcePort
                , SrcIpAddr=SourceIP
                , SrcMacAddr=SourceMACAddress
                , EventId=ExternalID
                , SrcDvcHostname=SourceHostName
| extend EventType=Activity
| project-away AdditionalExtensions
            , Activity
            , ReceiptTime
            , DeviceVendor
            , DeviceProduct
            , DeviceCustomNumber1
            , DeviceCustomNumber1Label
            , DeviceCustomNumber2
            , DeviceCustomNumber2Label
            , DeviceCustomNumber3
            , DeviceCustomNumber3Label
            , DeviceCustomString1
            , DeviceCustomString1Label
            , DeviceCustomString2
            , DeviceCustomString2Label
            , DeviceCustomString3
            , DeviceCustomString3Label
            , DeviceCustomString4
            , DeviceCustomString4Label
            , DeviceCustomString5
            , DeviceCustomString5Label
            , DeviceCustomString6
            , DeviceCustomString6Label
            , cs7Label
            , cs7
            , cs8Label
            , cs8
            , cs9Label
            , cs9
            , cs10Label
            , cs10

ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType has 'Baseline Deviation' or EventType has 'Baseline Deviation'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for baseline deviation events.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType has 'New Conflict Asset' or EventType has 'New Conflict Asset'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventSeverity == '5'
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for critical severity events.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType =~ 'Alert'
| where EventType has 'Login'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for PLC login security alerts.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventType has 'Login to SRA'
| where EventType !has 'succeeded'
| extend SrcUsername = extract(@'User\s(.*?)\sfailed', 1, EventMessage)
| summarize count() by SrcUsername
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUsername

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for login failure events.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType has_any ('Network Scan', 'TCP Scan', 'UDP Scan') or EventType has_any ('Network Scan', 'TCP Scan', 'UDP Scan')
| project TimeGenerated, SrcIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for sources of network scans.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType has_any ('Network Scan', 'TCP Scan', 'UDP Scan') or EventType has_any ('Network Scan', 'TCP Scan', 'UDP Scan')
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for targets of network scans.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventSeverity =~ 'Unapproved'
| where isnotempty(CategoryAccess)
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for unapproved access events.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventOriginalType =~ 'Alert'
| where ResolvedAs =~ 'Unresolved'
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for alerts with unresolved status.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(CategoryAccess)
| where CategoryAccess != 'Read'
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query searches for operations with Write and Execute accesses.

connectorUiConfig.title: Claroty
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Claroty](https://claroty.com/) data connector provides the capability to ingest [Continuous Threat Detection](https://claroty.com/continuous-threat-detection/) and [Secure Remote Access](https://claroty.com/secure-remote-access/) events into Azure Sentinel.

sampleQueries.query:
ClarotyEvent
 | where isnotempty(DstIpAddr)
    | summarize count() by DstIpAddr
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog (Claroty)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ClarotyEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ClarotyEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**ClarotyEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-claroty-parser) which is deployed with the Azure Sentinel Solution.

Install and configure the Linux agent to collect your Common Event Format (CEF) Syslog messages and forward them to Azure Sentinel.

> Notice that the data from all regions will be stored in the selected workspace

innerSteps.title: 1.1 Select or create a Linux machine
innerSteps.description: Select or create a Linux machine that Azure Sentinel will use as the proxy between your security solution and Azure Sentinel this machine can be on your on-prem environment, Azure or other clouds.

innerSteps.title: 1.2 Install the CEF collector on the Linux machine
innerSteps.description:
Install the Microsoft Monitoring Agent on your Linux machine and configure the machine to listen on the necessary port and forward messages to your Azure Sentinel workspace. The CEF collector collects CEF messages on port 514 TCP.

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version.

> 2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine.

parameters.label: Run the following command to install and apply the CEF collector:

instructionSteps.title: 1. Linux Syslog agent configuration

instructionSteps.description:
Configure log forwarding using CEF:

1. Navigate to the **Syslog** section of the Configuration menu.

2. Select **+Add**.

3. In the **Add New Syslog Dialog** specify Remote Server **IP**, **Port**, **Protocol** and select **Message Format** - **CEF**.

4. Choose **Save** to exit the **Add Syslog dialog**.
instructionSteps.title: 2.  Configure Claroty to send logs using CEF

instructionSteps.description:
Follow the instructions to validate your connectivity:

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the CommonSecurityLog schema.

>It may take about 20 minutes until the connection streams data to your workspace.

If the logs are not received, run the following connectivity validation script:

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version

>2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine

parameters.label: Run the following command to validate your connectivity:

instructionSteps.title: 3. Validate connection

instructionSteps.description:
Make sure to configure the machine's security according to your organization's security policy


[Learn more >](https://aka.ms/SecureCEF)
instructionSteps.title: 4. Secure your machine

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**ClarotyEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-claroty-parser) which is deployed with the Azure Sentinel Solution.

properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Asset Down' or EventType has 'Asset Down'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

properties.description: Detects when critical deviation from baseline occurs.
properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Baseline Deviation' or EventType has 'Baseline Deviation'
| where EventSeverity == '5'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

properties.description: Detects user login to uncommon location.
properties.query:
let usr_sites =
ClarotyEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where EventType has 'Login to SRA succeeded'
| extend SrcUsername = extract(@'User\s(.*?)\slogged', 1, EventMessage)
| summarize all_loc = makeset(tostring(site_name)) by SrcUsername
| extend k = 1;
ClarotyEvent
| where EventType has 'Login to SRA succeeded'
| extend SrcUsername = extract(@'User\s(.*?)\slogged', 1, EventMessage)
| extend k = 1
| join kind=innerunique (usr_sites) on k
| where all_loc !contains site_name
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Detects multiple failed logins by same user.
properties.displayName: Claroty - Multiple failed logins by user
properties.query:
let threshold = 5;
ClarotyEvent
| where EventType has 'Login to SRA'
| where EventType !has 'succeeded'
| extend SrcUsername = extract(@'User\s(.*?)\sfailed', 1, EventMessage)
| summarize count() by SrcUsername, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = SrcUsername

properties.description: Detects multiple failed logins to same destinations.
properties.displayName: Claroty - Multiple failed logins to same destinations
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
ClarotyEvent
| where EventType has 'Login to SRA'
| where EventType !has 'succeeded'
| extend SrcUsername = extract(@'User\s(.*?)\sfailed', 1, EventMessage)
| summarize count() by site_name, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend SGCustomEntity = site_name

properties.description: Triggers when a new asset has been added into the environment.
properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'New Asset' or EventType has 'New Asset'
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Policy Violation' or EventType has 'Policy Violation'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

properties.description: Detects suspicious behavior that is generally indicative of malware.
properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Suspicious Activity' or EventType has 'Suspicious Activity'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Suspicious File Transfer' or EventType has 'Suspicious File Transfer'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

properties.description: Detects Collection of known malware commands and control servers.
properties.query:
ClarotyEvent
| where EventOriginalType has 'Treat' or EventType has 'Treat'
| project TimeGenerated, DstIpAddr
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr
